author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS TO BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR LATER TODAY...
summary: ...RAYMOND TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS TO BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR LATER TODAY... As of 2:00 AM MST Sat Oct 11 the center of Raymond was located near 20.9, -109.2 with movement NW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
